While under the influence of [[Strengthening Prescription: Chakra Injection|dark chakra]], [[Setsuna]] and [[Shizuku]] combine their [[Nature Transformation|elemental]] [[ninjutsu]] ability to create a thunderstorm that could disperse bolts of lightning in order to demolish areas. Doing so quickly drained both dark chakra and regular chakra reserves.

== Trivia ==
* When this technique began to deconstruct, a strange apparition resembling the [[Umibōzu]] or some other creature briefly appeared.
* Being a mixture of water and wind, this technique bears the characteristics and similarities of the [[Storm Release]] used by [[Hiruko (missing-nin)|Hiruko]].
